alert.note: Alert for Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 3:10AM CST until January 12 at 1:00AM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 39 mph with gusts to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southern New Mexico and far west Texas. * WHEN...From now to midnight MST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust and reduced visibility are possible along the Lordsburg Playa and downwind of White Sands.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
